description_html:
The Parlour Collection is designed to inject a charming level of obscurity & character into any space. Inspired by the nostalgia of beauty and ice cream parlours of old, colours & shapes are reimagined in this new collection for Nodi, designed by Baldwin & Bagnall.

The collection features two designs; Duo, a whimsically shaped rug in a range of intoxicating hues, and Plaid, and over scale exploration of traditional plaid patterns in an extraordinary mixture of colours.
